task.title: Change the mode of replication
task.shortdesc: You can edit volume pair properties to change the replication mode of the volume pair relationship.

step.cmd: Click the Actions icon for the volume pair.
In the Edit Volume Pair pane, select a new replication mode:

ul.li: Real-time (Asynchronous): Writes are acknowledged to the client after they are committed on the source cluster.
Real-time (Synchronous): Writes are acknowledged to the client after they are committed on both the source and target clusters.
Snapshots Only: Only snapshots created on the source cluster are replicated. Active writes from the source volume are not replicated.

info.note: Changing the mode of replication changes the mode immediately. Be sure that you have coordinated these changes at both sites.
